en_us: From cauldron-made potions to potion-filled tanks! Store your tier IV potions and wormholes in Liquid Tanks!
Zauber Potions can be stored in liquid tanks. Soulutions can be taken out by placing soul fire under the liquid tank.\n\nMobs under a zauber potion tank will gain the specific potion effect.

If any mobs walks under a wormhole tank it will teleport to that location.\n\nWhen a tank receives a wormhole, it will update its location to the midpoint of its current location and the new location, keeping the dimension of the original location.
